Join the Ionic Team!

Want to change the way the world builds mobile apps? Come join the Ionic team to empower developers to build high quality, interactive, and beautiful mobile apps with web technologies they already know and love.

We believe the world is missing a huge opportunity to bring the web to mobile, and that we can be a major leader in this massive and fast-growing market.

We are looking for some smart, driven, and independent people to join our growing team in Madison, Wisconsin, or remotely (for some positions).

About Us

Ionic is a well-funded and tight-knit team with a office located right by the state capitol in Madison, WI and with remote employees around the US. The company behind Ionic was founded in 2012 with the goal of making incredibly powerful and easy-to-use development tools.
